nodes.bodyText: I think this is the wrong base64.  It should be the URL safe variant without padding.  To do that in discv5 I had to use: https://github.com/PegaSysEng/discovery/blob/247107e61cd53ed4c05ea2401985094ae1c3668d/src/main/java/org/ethereum/beacon/discovery/schema/NodeRecord.java#L84

Oh, thanks! Absolutely my bad, should read the spec more carefully.
Didn't even think there might be 'wrong' base64 :)

BTW, wouldn't this work?
java.util.Base64.getUrlEncoder().withoutPadding()
UPD: just checked - these are equivalent
I did not know that method existed.... ConsenSys/discovery#43 will switch discovery to use it.
